name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour: American Puzzles
summary:
Explore the USA in this amazing jigsaw puzzle game!

Come with us on a breath-taking tour of the most beautiful places in the USA! See New York City's famous skyscrapers and California's sunny beaches, visit the last active volcanoes in Alaska and warm up again on the tropical islands of Hawaii. All this and more is waiting for you in this awesome Logic game!

Create your own jigsaw puzzles from hundreds of stunning photographs and set out on an epic journey through all 50 states of the USA!
